name: Re:PUNCH!!!
description:
Have you ever wished you could go back in time and punch yourself in the face? No?

Just me?

And Harold, the legendary hero, who is tasked with thinking of his most painful memories and going back to punch himself in the face for being so unlikeable! Battle against a variety of unique puzzle-like bosses and learn to master a battle system where any and all damage can be avoided! Become a Re:PUNCH Master!!!

Ver 1.0.1

This game is an entry in the 2022 Harold Jam!
